thread.title: Chelsea transfer news: Fernerbahce ready to listen to offers of £13million for Simon Kjaer | Metro News
thread.title_full: Chelsea transfer news: Fernerbahce ready to listen to offers of £13million for Simon Kjaer | Metro News

author: Louis Sealey For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Chelsea transfer news: Fernerbahce ready to listen to offers of £13million for Simon Kjaer | Metro News
text:
Fernerbahce ready to listen to offers of £13million for Chelsea target Simon Kjaer gossip Louis Sealey for Metro.co.uk Sunday 26 Feb 2017 3:35 am Fenerbahce defender Simon Kjaer was linked with Chelsea in January (Picture: Getty) 
Fernerbahce are ready to listen to offers of around £13million for Chelsea target Simon Kjaer, reports say. 
Centre back Kjaer has become an important member of Fernebahce’s squad since joining the Turkish giants in 2015 but was strongly linked with a move to the Premier League in January. Jurgen Klopp sends warning to his Liverpool flops after Leicester loss 
Fernerbahce were forced to release a statement during the winter window, in which they denied Chelsea has tabled a bid, to play down speculation over the 27-year-old’s future. 
But the Blues are believed to remain interested in Kjaer and could revive their interest in the Denmark international at the end of the season. 
Turkish Football say a bid in the region of £13million would force the Fernerbahce board to consider selling Kjaer, who is under contract until 2019. 
Speaking about the reported interest last month, Kjaer told Goal : ‘It is flattering to be mentioned in connection with other big clubs, and it confirms that I am doing things well. Antonio Conte is expected to bolster his Chelsea squad this summer (Picture: Getty)
